meanings.definition: A person who solders metal pieces together.
meanings.sent1: The solderers in the workshop carefully joined the metal pieces.
meanings.sent2: The skilled solderers fixed the broken circuit board.
meanings.sent3: The solderers at the factory were always sticking things together.
meanings.sent4: The team of solderers were like metal magicians, creating connections with ease.
meanings.sent5: Watching the solderers work was like witnessing a dance of metal fusion.

meanings.definition: The act of joining metal pieces together using solder.
meanings.sent1: Solderers require steady hands to perform their craft.
meanings.sent2: The solderers completed the task with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest solderers was intense.
meanings.sent4: The sound of sizzling solderers filled the air in the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The art of solderers transformed separate pieces into a unified whole.
